ygData.subject: Re: Where can I find Greater Heal?!
ygData.msgSnippet: What Lvl is Greater Heal?  You might wanna try the Clerics guild in Felwithe they seem to have tons of spells or maybe even in Qeynos.  If you re close to
ygData.messageBody:
What Lvl is Greater Heal? You might wanna try the Clerics guild in Felwithe
they seem to have tons of spells or maybe even in Qeynos. If you're close
to Qeynos I'd go for there first.

**************************
Azor
Lvl 18 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************



> From: "Rose" <rliu@...>
>
>
> OK last night I searched the Hall of Truth and the cleric guild in
Freeport
> and Can-Not-Find the stupid greater heal spell. I just ran all the way
from
> South Karana and before I ran allll the way back to Qeynos, I just need to
> know if the greater heal spell can be found in Qeynos. Anyone knows?
Also,
> maybe there is a vendor hidden somewhere in the cleric guild and I wasn't
> able to find him/her in Freeport...can the greater heal spell be found in
> Freeport at all? Help.
>
> -Imogen the frustrated
>
